text: First edition (publ. Warner Books) Cover artist:Jim Burns Tangents () is a collection of short stories by the science fiction writer Greg Bear. The stories originally appeared in a number of different publications. This collection, originally published in 1989, includes: *Blood Music (later expanded into the novel Blood Music) *Sleepside Story *Webster *A Martian Ricorso *Dead Run *Schrödinger's Plague *Through Road no Whither *Tangents *Sisters *The Machineries of Joy Category:1989 short story collections Category:Short story collections by Greg Bear
title: Tangents (collection)
